long_description: A compact and easy-to-stow safety essential, the North Water Micro Throw Line offers 50 ft. of floating line for an extra measure of safety on any paddling trip. It has a built in waterproof whistle, tie-down strap, reflective tape for high visibility and nylon mesh for quick draining and drying. The North Water Micro Throw Line fits in the palm of your hand and weighs a mere 260g. Meets Coast Guard regulation as a Buoyant Heaving Line.
short_description: A compact and easy-to-stow safety essential, the North Water Micro Throw Line offers 50 ft. of floating line for an extra measure of safety on any paddling trip.
